snippet.title: Cairn - Demo Teaser
snippet.description:
Cairn's demo is in the works! It's available exclusively at gamescom right now, and coming soon on Steam. 

Wishlist Cairn: https://bit.ly/Cairn-Steam     
Website: https://www.thegamebakers.com/cairn
Links: https://thegamebakers.carrd.co/

Cairn's demo will take you on the first leg of Aava's journey, as she trains for her ascent of Mount Kami. You will learn the basic in Tenzen National Park, where you will have full freedom to explore, climb, forage, and cook.

Cairn features realistic simulation that allows you to climb intuitively, anywhere. Find the best holds and place your hands and feet seamlessly with simple controls. Adapt your posture, effort and balance - if you're not careful, you will fall!
